00030 #include "Exception.hpp"
00031 #include "LogFile.hpp"
00032 
00033 Exception::Exception(std::string message,
00034                      std::string filename, const unsigned rLineNumber)
00035 {
00036     std::stringstream line_number;
00037     line_number << rLineNumber;
00038 
00039     mMessage = std::string("\nChaste error: ") + filename + ":"  + line_number.str()  + ": " + message;
00040 
00046     // std::string log_file_message = "Exception occurred (although possibly handled), error message:\n" + message;
00047     // LOG(1, log_file_message);
00048 }
00049 
00050 
00051 std::string Exception::GetMessage() const
00052 {
00053     return mMessage;
00054 }
